long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sure, here is a more modified version with different symbols and additional changes:

🎶 UdioAI: Instantly Generate and Download Unique MP3 Songs

🔸 What is UdioAI?
UdioAI is an innovative generative AI model that creates music based on user inputs. The beta version was released to the public on April 10, 2024.

Creating Music with UdioAI
UdioAI allows users to describe the type of music they want, and the AI generates unique, high-quality tracks based on these prompts. It is often hailed as the "ChatGPT of music generation."

Impact and Features of UdioAI
While UdioAI's music may not replace human creativity, it serves as a powerful tool for musicians and music lovers. It is considered a game-changer in the AI music industry, alongside tools like Suno, Google MusicFX, and CassetteAI.

🔸 Crafting Your Prompt
Think about the feel, theme, or genre you want for your song. Provide a detailed description in the prompt box, such as “a chillwave track that captures the serenity of a beach sunset,” to guide the AI music generator effectively.

🔸 Generate and Review
Click the generate button. Listen to the generated track and refine your prompt as needed to achieve the desired result.

🔸 The Importance of Details
Specificity helps the AI music generator better capture your vision. Mentioning genres, moods, or specific instruments will guide the AI more accurately.

🔸 Features of UdioAI Music Generator

➢ Automatic Music Creation
The AI audio generator can automatically create unique, royalty-free music across a wide range of styles and genres. Using advanced machine learning algorithms, it generates new compositions based on text prompts, lyrical ideas, or other musical characteristics.

➢ Comprehensive Metadata
Some AI audio tools can generate detailed metadata for entire music catalogs, including genre, mood, instruments, and more. This feature can save significant time and effort for music creators and publishers.

➢ Variety of Music Styles
The AI audio generator can produce a vast array of musical styles, from classical to electronic, pop to ambient. Users can typically customize the generated music to suit their specific needs and preferences.

🔸 Privacy Policy

By design, your data remains secure within your Google account and is not stored on our servers. Your data is never shared with anyone, including the add-on owner.
We comply with privacy laws (including GDPR and the California Privacy Act) to protect your data.
All data you upload is automatically deleted daily.
